message: I'm feeling generous, but let's be realistic. This round only.
Come on, meet me in the middle
This is my final offer.  Take it or leave it.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it
Okay, Alice, let's be real.  We both lose if this keeps up.  I'm offering a perfectly fair 50/50 split.  Take it and we both win.
Your 50/50 split was a good try, but I think I can do better
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering you a larger share, but this is the absolute last time I'm moving.  If you don't accept this, we're done and we both lose.
I'm not bluffing, I'll take it all the way if I have to
